idea:
HOW DOES THE CHARTER PROCESS WORK ?

After your initial enquiry you will be assigned a personal charter expert who will send you a selection of quotes for you to choose from. Each quote will have a clear breakdown of aircrafts and airports and reasons they have been selected for you. Should you wish to go ahead they will then book the aircraft and send you all the flight details including directions to the terminal and any other important information. They will be your first point of call for any further enquiries you may have up to the flight and, if possible, they will meet you at the terminal. From your initial quote you will be able to contact your account manager 24/7 (if on holiday you will be assigned another account manager to cover) so you can call from wherever, whenever you like.

HOW DO I DECIDE WHICH AIRCRAFT TO CHARTER ?

Your dedicated account manager will advise you and provide you with a suitable range of aircraft based on your requirements, assisting you with your final decision. View our aircraft guide for further information.

HOW LONG BEFORE MY FLIGHT I NEED TO CHECK IN ?

Using private terminals means that you are able to check-in much closer to take-off than you could on a scheduled service flight. Sometimes you can arrive as little as 15 minutes before the aircraft is due to depart, and in some cases you can even be driven directly to the aircraft for boarding.
name: RAVIDAS AIRLINES LIMITED

idea:
We are a printing and packaging company. We focus on developing sustainable packaging solutions that have minimal environmental impact and minimum carbon foot print. To put in simple words we believe in developing and supplying earth-friendly packaging materials which doesn't contribute to the further depletion of natural resources.

Numen Ventures is an Ethical and environmental conscious organization. We agree to supply only those packaging requirements which are recyclable or made of recycled materials. We wont hesitate to deny any lucerative packaging supply orders which does not fit into our core values. We have a vast experience into printing and packaging Industry we are passionate about searching the right equipments to produce the required sustainable packaging materials for the target customer in bulk.
name: NUMEN VENTURES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
India seal is one of the leading Packaging Service Providers for Exporters Cargo in India.


India seal was founded by Mr. Anand D. Dhall in the year 2002. We are known as amongst the leading manufacturers of wooden pallets and service providers for container lashing, container choking, and project cargo packing. We supply a wide range of `the best quality wooden pallets, packaging boxes, and other packaging materials to our customers.

With the strong backing of 13 years in the arena of trade, we have gained an edge in our services. The team of veterans from the industry on board ensures we deliver solutions and services par excellence to our clients across our geographical reach.


As a progressive and customer-centric organization, we are committed to delivering prompt and excellent services. Our services are end-to-end and all-inclusive. Our clients relish our valued consultation and tailor-made solutions including customized pallet sourcing to complete sturdy and reliable packaging.


We strategically liaise with our valued business partners and provide seamless project cargo packaging.
name: INDIA SEAL PACKAGING PRIVATE LIMITED
